Text.Page:
The attacks by the {@LinkCreature:39#140#slave wardens} and {@LinkCreature:39#150#delirious slaves} around the camp are more than we can handle on our own.

We'd appreciate you slowing them down a bit.

Unless you just came for the scenery...
You did good work, <PCNAME>. If you'd stay, we could send some poor wretch home. Who knows...it might even be me! Or Chaman. Gods know she's earned it.
